# Event
Society of Cutaneous Oncology Research Forum

# Overview & Learning Objectives
- We review results from a dual-institutional observation study of patients with Merkel Cell Carcinoma who underwent Merkel Cell Polyoma Virus antibody testing within 90 days of diagnosis.
